misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko, a gentleman of leisure and member of Hirsala Golf, brings a certain *je ne sais quoi* to the greens. A noted wine connoisseur, Jaakko is as comfortable discussing the merits of a fine Bordeaux as he is lining up a tricky putt.

While his dedication to the finer things in life is admirable, rumours abound that Jaakko's relaxed approach to timekeeping might occasionally lead to a hurried arrival at the tee. Spectators are advised to keep an eye out for a last-minute dash just before his tee time.

This year marks Jaakko's fourth appearance at the Hector Troph√©e. While victory has eluded him thus far, his presence undoubtedly enriches the tournament. We look forward to seeing Jaakko bring his unique blend of sophistication and sporting spirit to the fairways once again.
